entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Race condition in shared form mapping resolution logic #50464
  • Redis OutputCache no longer works on rc1 #50452
  • BlazorEnableCompression flag is ignored when publishing Blazor WASM projects #50451
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #50449

Closed

  • UserManager.IsInRoleAsync(appUser, "rolename") and User.IsInrole("rolename") may return different results #50125
  • Crash due to INVALID_POINTER_READ NativeRequestContext.GetRequestInfo #50445
  • Templates for previous frameworks are not available on .NET 8 (nightly) rc builds #50390
  • it is possible to use the [Authorize] attribute in Blazor controllers #50392

PullRequests

Created

  • Tidy up aka.ms links in data protection error messages #50465
    area-dataprotection
  • Merge property attributes with parameter attributes for AsParameters #50458
    area-minimal
  • Split redis output-cache pieces from Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchange.Redis into Microsoft.AspNetCore.OutputCaching.StackExchangeRedis #50457
    area-middleware
  • Fix outputcache bug when using IOutputCacheBufferStore #50455
    area-networking
  • Fix scripts in SSR updates #50453
    area-blazor
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Validate install-scripts changes #50450
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix pRequestInfo INVALID_POINTER_READ caused by GCs (v7 backport) #50448
    Servicing-approved, community-contribution, area-networking, 7.0.x
  • Fix pRequestInfo INVALID_POINTER_READ caused by GCs (v6 backport) #50447
    Servicing-approved, community-contribution, area-networking, 6.0.x
  • Fix exception handling for complex form mapping in minimal APIs #50444
    feature-rdg, area-minimal

Merged

  • HttpLogging redaction and enrichment #50163
    area-infrastructure, area-middleware, 8.0-rc2
  • Update branding to 6.0.23 #50461
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.23
  • Rename area-runtime in fabricbot #50460
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Update branding to 7.0.12 #50462
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.12
  • [release/8.0] Fix pRequestInfo INVALID_POINTER_READ caused by GCs #50459
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-networking, 8.0-rc2
  • Update milestones for October servicing #50463
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix pRequestInfo INVALID_POINTER_READ caused by GCs #50446
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Update SDK to 9.0.100-alpha.1.23421.9 #49911
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50422
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Add ProblemDetials.Extensions to ControllerBase.Problem and ControllerBase.ValidationProblem #50204
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Fix Set size in HttpLoggingOptions #50426
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Modernize Redis distributed cache #45735
    area-networking
  • Make MapIdentityApi DTOs public #50247
    area-identity
  • [Blazor] APIs to preserve content between enhanced navigations #50437
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2257055 #49575
    area-mvc
  • [release/8.0] Add feature to expose IIS hosting details #50443
    area-networking
  • [Blazor] Form mapping support for select multiple, logging, DataMember and other improvements/cleanups #50431
    area-blazor
  • SignalR MessageBuffer fixes #50315
    area-signalr
  • Suppress nullability warning when resolving JSON body or service #50410
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Fix corrupted streaming SSR output #50380
    area-blazor, .NET 8 Planning
